About the Conference

Why Participate in ICISSE-2025?

Participating in ICISSE-2025 offers a unique opportunity to engage with leading experts, researchers, and industry practitioners from around the world in the rapidly evolving fields of smart and sustainable engineering.

This conference serves as a platform for knowledge exchange, collaboration, and networking, fostering innovative solutions for pressing global challenges such as renewable energy integration, smart grids, IoT applications, and sustainable infrastructure development.

Moreover, a multidisciplinary technical track covering science, engineering and technology domain will provide latest technological advancements, present their research, and explore potential partnerships that can accelerate their careers and contribute to societal progress.

The hybrid format ensures accessibility for participants worldwide, making it an ideal event for academics, industry professionals, policy makers, and students dedicated to building smarter, greener, and more resilient environments.

Publication opportunities in reputed Scopus indexed journal / Google Scholar indexed journal / conference proceeding.

Global Networking

Engage with leading experts, researchers, and industry practitioners worldwide.

Publication Opportunities

Publish in reputed Scopus / Google Scholar indexed journals or conference proceedings.

Hybrid Format

Ensures accessibility for participants worldwide, making it an ideal event for all stakeholders.

Institution

About Teerthanker Mahaveer University

Teerthanker Mahaveer University, a prestigious institution dedicated to academic excellence, was established by an ‘Act’ (No. 30) of 2008 of the Government of Uttar Pradesh and approved by the University Grants Commission (UGC) in 2008.

Located 144 km from New Delhi along National Highway 9, TMU upholds the ideals of Lord Mahaveer—Right Philosophy, Right Knowledge, and Right Conduct in every aspect of its activities. The university is a leading destination for world-class education.

As a multi-disciplinary varsity, we offer career-oriented programmes at all levels, i.e., UG, PG, and Doctoral degrees across diverse streams such as Medical, Dental, Pharmacy, Nursing, Paramedical Sciences, Physiotherapy, Hospital Administration, Physical Education, Management, Computer Sciences, Engineering, Education, Law, Fine Arts, Agriculture and Jain Studies.

Education at TMU is not just about books and classrooms, but also about personality development and honing specialized skills. We provide an environment conducive to teaching and learning supported by innovative practices.

Department

About College of Engineering

Teerthanker Mahaveer University (TMU) College of Engineering, Moradabad, is a leading engineering institute in Uttar Pradesh, dedicated to nurturing innovation, research, and technical excellence.

The college is recognized and approved by AICTE, UGC, and accredited under the tier-1 category by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs across major engineering and technology disciplines with a curriculum aligned to industry trends and emerging technologies.

With a proven track record of academic achievements, innovation, and placements, TMU College of Engineering continues its commitment to shaping future engineers who can contribute to technology and society at both national and global levels.

Modern Infrastructure

State-of-the-art laboratories, well-stocked libraries, and advanced computing facilities enabling hands-on learning and experimentation.

Expert Faculty

Our faculty comprises highly qualified, experienced educators deeply committed to student success and professional development.

Excellent Placements

Dedicated placement cell maintaining an excellent placement record, facilitating internships and job opportunities with top recruiters.

Strong Industry Connect

TCS L&T Bosch UltraTech NVIDIA
Department Focus

About The Department

The Department of Electrical Engineering at Teerthanker Mahaveer University (TMU), Moradabad, offers a forward-looking curriculum that provides students with a robust foundation in electrical circuits, power electronics, control systems, and renewable energy, while also training them in cutting-edge fields like smart grids, electric vehicles, and automation.

The department emphasizes both theoretical and practical learning through state-of-the-art laboratories, strong industry partnerships, hands-on projects, and frequent workshops, ultimately preparing graduates for real-world challenges and successful careers in leading organizations.

TMU Electrical Engineering stands out for its focus on research, innovation, and sustainability, facilitating student development not just as competent engineers but as responsible, industry-ready professionals equipped to contribute to the future of technology and society.

Conference Goals

Objectives of the Conference

01

Promote Research & Innovation

To provide a common platform for academicians, researchers, industry experts, and students to share their innovative ideas, research outcomes, and technological advancements in the field of smart and sustainable engineering.

02

Encourage Multidisciplinary Collaboration

To foster collaboration and exchange of knowledge across various disciplines of engineering and technology for developing sustainable and intelligent solutions to real-world challenges.

03

Highlight Emerging Technologies

To explore the latest trends, tools, and techniques in areas such as renewable energy systems, smart materials, intelligent manufacturing, automation, artificial intelligence, and sustainable infrastructure.

04

Bridge Academia and Industry

To strengthen the interaction between academia, research organizations, and industries for promoting applied research, technology transfer, and industrial innovation.

05

Support Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

To align engineering research and innovation with the United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals, addressing key issues such as energy efficiency, environmental protection, and social well-being.

06

Encourage Young Researchers

To motivate young researchers, postgraduate students, and scholars to engage in high-quality research and to provide them with exposure to international standards of publication and presentation.

07

Facilitate Publication and Dissemination

To publish selected high-quality research papers in reputed journals or conference proceedings, ensuring the global visibility and impact of innovative engineering practices.

08

Create Networking Opportunities

To provide a forum for participants to establish research collaborations, professional connections, and partnerships for future projects in smart and sustainable engineering.

Conference Impact

Expected Outcomes

1

Enhanced Knowledge Exchange

Participants will gain a deeper understanding of the latest trends, research findings, and technological advancements in smart and sustainable engineering.

2

Publication of Quality Research

Selected peer-reviewed papers will be published in reputed journals or conference proceedings, enhancing global visibility of participants' research.

3

Interdisciplinary Research

The conference will encourage collaboration across diverse engineering domains, leading to new interdisciplinary projects and innovations.

4

Academia–Industry Linkages

Build stronger connections between academic institutions, industries, and research organizations, fostering partnerships for real-world problem-solving.

5

Sustainable Solutions

Discussions and presentations will inspire novel, eco-friendly, and energy-efficient engineering solutions aligned with sustainable development goals (SDGs).

6

Networking Opportunities

Participants will have opportunities to establish national and international networks for future research collaborations and academic exchanges.

7

Young Researchers

Young professionals and students will be motivated to pursue research careers and contribute to innovation-driven sustainable engineering practices.

8

Policy Recommendations

Conference outcomes may contribute to framing recommendations for sustainable engineering practices and policies at institutional levels.

9

Knowledge Repository

Proceedings and technical sessions will serve as a valuable reference for future studies in smart and sustainable engineering.

Conference Themes

Technical Tracks

Papers are invited for the conference to foster meaningful discussions and provide valuable insights that can guide researchers toward improving their study approaches. Participants will gain the opportunity to present their research work, receive constructive feedback from distinguished experts, and engage in productive networking that can pave the way for future research collaborations and development initiatives.

01

Emerging Trends in Green Energy and Sustainable Technologies

02

Next-Generation Power Systems and Smart Mobility Revolution

03

Advanced Functional Materials and Multidisciplinary Innovations

04

Sustainable Infrastructure and Future Technologies

05

Computational Intelligence and Soft Computing Applications

06

Innovation in IoT, Embedded, and Communication Technologies

Authors

Guidelines for Paper Submission

  • The names, affiliations, complete postal address, e-mail address of the authors should be typed below the title.
  • Pages for ISBN book chapters: 4-6.
  • The Paper should be typed on A4 size paper leaving aside 25 mm margin on the left and 20 mm margin on all other sides. The Paper shall highlight the aim of the work, procedures adopted for the study, and salient features of the results and conclusions.
  • Graphical abstract is encouraged but it is not mandatory.
  • At least one of the authors should register and present the work.
  • The full texts of paper in doc format must be sent by email to icisse2026@gmail.com.
  • For submission of Paper Abstract must be named as "Presenting Author Name".
  • The entire should be in Single Column, Times New Roman, with word size 12.

Note: Quality accepted Paper (4-6 pages) will be published in ISBN book with DOI Identifier. Extended quality papers after double peer review (approval of authors) will be published in Scopus indexed journals.

The paper has to be attached in the registration link. Authors also have to mail a copy of the Full paper to icisse2026@gmail.com.

Invitation to Authors

Authors are invited to submit the extended papers on Science, Technology, Engineering, Education. Participants will benefit from the opportunity to present their works, get valuable feedback from the experts, and will have the special provision to network for their future research and development.
